strike.narrative: In the first known US targeted assassination using a drone, a CIA Predator struck a car, killing 6 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: In the first known US targeted assassination using a drone, a CIA Predator struck a car killing six al Qaeda suspects.
names: Qa'id Salim Sinan al-Harithi, Abu Ahmad al-Hijazi, Salih Hussain Ali al-Nunu, Awsan Ahmad al-Tarihi, Munir Ahmad Abdallah al-Sauda, Adil Nasir al-Sauda'

strike.narrative: The first known fatal US drone strike inside Pakistan killed 6-8 people, including 2 children.
strike.bij_summary_short: First known drone strike in Pakistan kills at least six, including infamous Taliban leader Nek Mohammad and two children. Wana, South Waziristan.
names: Nek Mohammad, Fakhar Zaman, Azmat Khan, Marez Khan, Shahrukh Khan, Leetak, Sher Zaman Ashrafkhel

strike.narrative: 2 people killed in a Predator strike which reportedly targeted Haitham al-Yemeni's mobile phone.
strike.bij_summary_short: Two killed, including Haitham al-Yemeni an al Qaeda explosives expert, near Mir Ali, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: A failed strike destroyed Abu Hamza Rabia's house and killed 8 people, including 3 young girls.
strike.bij_summary_short: Failed strike against Abu Hamza Rabia ("al Qaeda's Number 3") kills eight including three children.
